attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ban audley harrison from being able to box again. he is an embarrassment to British sportsmanship, he keeps talking about winning a world title but gets KO by journeymen. He also doesn’t like being punched which is a bit of a problem for a boxer and he is also very boring, please can the prime minister ban Audley Harrison from fighting.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
